snippet: The Japanese automaker, which has led the world in sales, reported record profit but said that net profit for the next year would be down about 2 percent.
abstract: Toyota reports record annual profit and sales of more than 10 million vehicles for the first time; news is overshadowed by forecast that profit will decline by about 2 percent, to $17.5 billion, for financial year ending in March 2015.
lead_paragraph: The Japanese automaker, which has led the world in sales, reported record profit but said that net profit for the next year would be down about 2 percent.

headline.main: Toyota Forecasts Drop in Profit for Fiscal Year
headline.print_headline: Toyota Forecasts Drop in Profit for Fiscal Year
